content.question: Which of the following is a learned response?

choices.label: An instinctual behavior triggered by a sign stimulus
The imprinting mechanism of a newborn duck following its mother
A defensive reflex to an aversive stimulus
A behavior strengthened by secondary reinforcement

content.answer: A behavior strengthened by secondary reinforcement

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
